body_html:
@ViktorM @Magicfeng007 @alc5978
The 9.1 thread is here if you want to follow along although it is basically closed. If you could list why you want 9.1 that would be useful, and what is your setup/configuration. A benchmark that you ran showing the perf boost would also be useful in understanding the immediate need. In meetings with NVIDIA, we both agreed there was not an immediate need to make 9.1 the default. which would then force people to upgrade their drivers again.

body:
@ViktorM @Magicfeng007 @alc5978 
The 9.1 [thread  is here](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/15140) if you want to follow along although it is basically closed.  If you could list why you want 9.1 that would be useful, and what is your setup/configuration.  A benchmark that you ran showing the perf boost would also be useful in understanding the immediate need.  In meetings with NVIDIA, we both agreed there was not an immediate need to make 9.1 the default. which would then force people to upgrade their drivers again.
